verses.verse: At that time,<WH6256> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> will I be the God<WH430> of all the families<WH4940> of Israel,<WH3478> and they shall be my people.<WH5971>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> The people<WH5971> who were left<WH8300> of the sword<WH2719> found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in the wilderness;<WH4057> even Israel,<WH3478> when I went<WH1980> to cause him to rest.<WH7280>

Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> of old<WH7350> to me,<WH157> saying, Yes, I have loved you with an everlasting<WH5769> love:<WH160> therefore with loving<WH160> kindness<WH2617> have I drawn you.<WH4900>

Again will I build<WH1129> you,<WH1129> and you shall be built, O virgin<WH1330> of Israel:<WH3478> again you shall be adorned<WH5710> with your tambourines,<WH8596> and shall go forth<WH3318> in the dances<WH4234> of those who make merry.<WH7832>
Again you shall plant<WH5193> vineyards<WH3754> on the mountains<WH2022> of Samaria;<WH8111> the planters<WH5193> shall plant,<WH5193> and shall enjoy its fruit.<WH2490>

For there shall be<WH3426> a day,<WH3117> that the watchmen<WH5341> on the hills<WH2022> of Ephraim<WH669> shall cry,<WH7121> Arise,<WH6965> and let us go up<WH5927> to Zion<WH6726> to Yahweh<WH3068> our God.<WH430>

For thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> Sing<WH7442> with gladness<WH8057> for Jacob,<WH3290> and shout<WH6670> for the chief<WH7218> of the nations:<WH1471> publish,<WH8085> praise,<WH1984> and say,<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> save<WH3467> your people,<WH5971> the remnant<WH7611> of Israel.<WH3478>

Behold,<WH935> I will bring them from the north<WH6828> country,<WH776> and gather<WH6908> them from the uttermost parts<WH3411> of the earth,<WH776> along with the blind<WH5787> and the lame,<WH6455> the woman with child<WH2030> and her who travails with child<WH3205> together:<WH3162> a great<WH1419> company<WH6951> shall they return here.<WH7725>

They shall come<WH935> with weeping;<WH1065> and with petitions<WH8469> will I lead<WH2986> them:<WH3212> I will cause them to walk by rivers<WH5158> of waters,<WH4325> in a straight<WH3477> way<WH1870> in which they shall not stumble;<WH3782> for I am a father<WH1> to Israel,<WH3478> and Ephraim<WH669> is my firstborn.<WH1060>

Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> you nations,<WH1471> and declare<WH5046> it in the islands<WH339> afar off;<WH4801> and say,<WH559> He who scattered<WH2219> Israel<WH3478> will gather<WH6908> him,<WH8104> and keep him,<WH7462> as shepherd does his flock.<WH5739>
For Yahweh<WH3068> has ransomed<WH1350> Jacob,<WH3290> and redeemed<WH6299> him from the hand<WH3027> of him who was stronger than he.<WH2389>

They shall come<WH935> and sing<WH7442> in the height<WH4791> of Zion,<WH6726> and shall flow to<WH5102> the goodness<WH2898> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to the grain,<WH1715> and to the new wine,<WH8492> and to the oil,<WH3323> and to the young<WH1121> of the flock<WH6629> and of the herd:<WH1241> and their soul<WH5315> shall be as a watered<WH7302> garden;<WH1588> and they shall not sorrow<WH1669> any more at all.<WH3254>

Then shall the virgin<WH1330> rejoice<WH8055> in the dance,<WH4234> and the young men<WH970> and the old<WH2205> together;<WH3162> for I will turn<WH2015> their mourning<WH60> into joy,<WH8342> and will comfort<WH5162> them,<WH8055> and make them rejoice from their sorrow.<WH3015>
I will satiate<WH7301> the soul<WH5315> of the priests<WH3548> with fatness,<WH1880> and my people<WH5971> shall be satisfied<WH7646> with my goodness,<WH2898> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> A voice<WH6963> is heard<WH8085> in Ramah,<WH7414> lamentation,<WH5092> and bitter<WH8563> weeping,<WH1065> Rachel<WH7354> weeping<WH1058> for her children;<WH1121> she refuses<WH3985> to be comforted<WH5162> for her children,<WH1121> because they are no more.

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> Refrain<WH4513> your voice<WH6963> from weeping,<WH1065> and your eyes<WH5869> from tears;<WH1832> for your work<WH6468> shall be<WH3426> rewarded,<WH7939> says<WH5002> Yahweh;<WH3068> and they shall come again<WH7725> from the land<WH776> of the enemy.<WH341>
There is<WH3426> hope<WH8615> for your latter end,<WH319> says<WH5002> Yahweh;<WH3068> and your children<WH1121> shall come again<WH7725> to their own border.<WH1366>

I have surely<WH8085> heard<WH8085> Ephraim<WH669> bemoaning<WH5110> himself thus,<WH3256> You have chastised me,<WH3256> and I was chastised, as an untrained calf:<WH5695> turn<WH7725> me,<WH7725> and I shall be turned; for you are Yahweh<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

Surely after<WH310> that I was turned,<WH7725> I repented;<WH5162> and after<WH310> that I was instructed,<WH3045> I struck<WH5606> on my thigh:<WH3409> I was ashamed,<WH954> yes,<WH3637> even confounded, because I bore<WH5375> the reproach<WH2781> of my youth.<WH5271>

Is Ephraim<WH669> my dear<WH3357> son?<WH1121> is he a darling<WH8191> child?<WH3206> for as often<WH1767> as I speak<WH1696> against him,<WH2142> I do earnestly remember<WH2142> him still:<WH4578> therefore my heart yearns<WH1993> for him;<WH7355> I will surely have mercy<WH7355> on him,<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>

Set up<WH5324> road signs,<WH6725> make<WH7760> guideposts;<WH8564> set<WH7896> your heart<WH3820> toward the highway,<WH4546> even the way<WH1870> by which you went:<WH1980> turn again,<WH7725> virgin<WH1330> of Israel,<WH3478> turn again<WH7725> to these your cities.<WH5892>

How long will you go here<WH2559> and there,<WH7728> you backsliding daughter?<WH1323> for Yahweh<WH3068> has created<WH1254> a new thing<WH2319> in the earth:<WH776> a woman<WH5347> shall encompass<WH5437> a man.<WH1397>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> Yet again shall they use<WH559> this speech<WH1697> in the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063> and in its cities,<WH5892> when I shall bring again<WH7725> their captivity:<WH7622> Yahweh<WH3068> bless<WH1288> you,<WH5116> habitation of righteousness,<WH6664> mountain<WH2022> of holiness.<WH6944>
Judah<WH3063> and all its cities<WH5892> shall dwell<WH3427> therein together,<WH3162> the farmers,<WH406> and those who go about<WH5265> with flocks.<WH5739>
For I have satiated<WH7301> the weary<WH5889> soul,<WH5315> and every sorrowful<WH1669> soul<WH5315> have I replenished.<WH4390>
On this I awakened,<WH6974> and saw;<WH7200> and my sleep<WH8142> was sweet to me.<WH6149>

Behold,<WH3117> the days come,<WH935> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> that I will sow<WH2232> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> with the seed<WH2233> of man,<WH120> and with the seed<WH2233> of animal.<WH929>

It shall happen that,<WH8245> like as I have watched over them to pluck up<WH5428> and to break down<WH5422> and to overthrow<WH2040> and to destroy<WH6> and to afflict,<WH7489> so will I watch over<WH8245> them to build<WH1129> and to plant,<WH5193> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>
In those days<WH3117> they shall say<WH559> no more,<WH1> The fathers have eaten<WH398> sour grapes,<WH1155> and the children<WH1121>'s teeth<WH8127> are set on edge.<WH6949>
But everyone<WH376> shall die<WH4191> for his own iniquity:<WH5771> every man<WH120> who eats<WH398> the sour grapes,<WH1155> his teeth<WH8127> shall be set on edge.<WH6949>

Behold,<WH3117> the days come,<WH935> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> that I will make<WH3772> a new<WH2319> covenant<WH1285> with the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> and with the house<WH1004> of Judah:<WH3063>

not according to the covenant<WH1285> that I made<WH3772> with their fathers<WH1> in the day<WH3117> that I took<WH2388> them by the hand<WH3027> to bring them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714> which my covenant<WH1285> they broke,<WH6565> although I was a husband<WH1166> to them,<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>

But this is the covenant<WH1285> that I will make<WH3772> with the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> after<WH310> those days,<WH3117> says<WH5002> Yahweh:<WH3068> I will put<WH5414> my law<WH8451> in their inward parts,<WH7130> and in their heart<WH3820> will I write<WH3789> it;<WH430> and I will be their God, and they shall be my people:<WH5971>

and they shall teach<WH3925> no more every man<WH376> his neighbor,<WH7453> and every man<WH376> his brother,<WH251> saying,<WH559> Know<WH3045> Yahweh;<WH3068> for they shall all know<WH3045> me,<WH6996> from their least to their greatest,<WH1419> says<WH5002> Yahweh:<WH3068> for I will forgive<WH5545> their iniquity,<WH5771> and their sin<WH2403> will I remember no more.<WH2142>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> who gives<WH5414> the sun<WH8121> for a light<WH216> by day,<WH3119> and the ordinances<WH2708> of the moon<WH3394> and of the stars<WH3556> for a light<WH216> by night,<WH3915> who stirs<WH7280> up the sea,<WH3220> so that its waves<WH1530> roar;<WH1993> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is his name:<WH8034>

If these ordinances<WH2706> depart<WH4185> from before<WH6440> me,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> then the seed<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> also shall cease<WH7673> from being a nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> me forever.<WH3117>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> If heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605> can be measured,<WH4058> and the foundations<WH4146> of the earth<WH776> searched out<WH2713> beneath,<WH4295> then will I also cast off<WH3988> all the seed<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> for all that they have done,<WH6213> says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Behold,<WH3117> the days come,<WH935> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> that the city<WH5892> shall be built<WH1129> to Yahweh<WH3068> from the tower<WH4026> of Hananel<WH2606> to the gate<WH8179> of the corner.<WH6438>
The measuring<WH4060> line<WH6957> shall go out<WH3318> further straight onward to the hill<WH1389> Gareb,<WH1619> and shall turn about<WH5437> to Goah.<WH1601>

The whole valley<WH6010> of the dead bodies<WH6297> and of the ashes,<WH1880> and all the fields<WH7709> to the brook<WH5158> Kidron,<WH6939> to the corner<WH6438> of the horse<WH5483> gate<WH8179> toward the east,<WH4217> shall be holy<WH6944> to Yahweh;<WH3068> it shall not be plucked up,<WH5428> nor thrown down<WH2040> any more forever.<WH5769>
